item.title: Gemini AI-Powered Voice Assistant
item.author: fabianmolina@stanford.edu (Fabian Molina)
item.description: Project Description: For this project, I built an AI-powered voice assistant on a Raspberry Pi 4 using Googleâ€™s Gemini API to handle speech recognition and response. The assistant includes both text-to-speech and speech-to-text functionalities, allowing it to interact with users and automate home processes like controlling lights and playing music.
